conversion_verification.notes: Successful volumetric 3D transformation with accurate isometric projection.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent wall geometry, thickness, and volumetric clarity with clean cutaway.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout fidelity is high; rooms match the 2D plan precisely in adjacency and proportion.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture color-codes and placement match the 2D plan, including the specific sofa arrangement and dining set.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering; consistent materials and lighting. No text contamination.

detected_errors.description: Minor variations in window frame thickness compared to 1:1 architectural scale but matches placement.

summary: High-fidelity 3D transformation that precisely preserves the architectural layout, furniture orientation, and spatial relationships of the 2D floor plan.
